page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: { {A school day. I get up about 8 o'clock.I usually go to school in black cotton and polyester trousers.I set off about 8.45 and arrive at 8.55 when school starts.I walk up three flights of stairs to my classroom.At 9o'clock our teacher does register and then we have assembly where we sing and listen to stories.After this we do basic maths or SMP.At 10.45 we have playtime after which we write stories or have music until dinner at 12.00.Most chldren stay for dinner at school.In the afternoon we do games such as football and rounders.We also do project or topic work.We are doing a topic about London because our class are visitng London next week.After games or topic it is usually ten minutes to four which means it is time to go home.
